verbs.description: [ARG0: israeli pm] [V: favors] [ARG1: naming envoy to christian world israel prime minister says] he favors appointing an envoy to the christian world a sign of israel efforts to foster close ties with its christian allies benjamin netanyahu spoke sunday at a meeting in jerusalem of visiting journalists from christian media where he was warmly received by reporters he welcomed the idea suggested by one journalist to appoint such an emissary as a great idea the summit reflects the strengthening ties between israel and the evangelical christian world israel has come to rely on widespread evangelical support in recent years a move that has raised concerns among some jews in israel and abroad israel christian emissary prime minister jerusalem benjamin netanyahu
